"Fine, " Havotron replied,  looking, once again, over the disfigured 
bot.  "You will take a place in our base, but enough of this 
Decepticons, back to the mountain.  We must get back to prepare 
an assualt on Megatron again."

With that Havotron flew into the air, Needlenose following.
